document.full_text: a roman catholic order of priests sacked its leader in the netherlands and disciplined another priest monday after the two publicly defended pedophile sex, an issue haunting the worldwide church in recent years.
document.title: dutch catholic order hit by pedophile group scandal
lines_and_colors: a roman catholic order of priests sacked its leader in the netherlands and disciplined another priest monday after the two publicly defended pedophile sex, an issue haunting the worldwide church in recent years.
